title: Provide some help please?
body: So my cursor isn't showing up in games unless i get into windowed mode. what's up with that? is there anything i can do to fix that? why is that happening? thank you.

replies.body:
As a temporary fix have you tried using windowed borderless mode?

Do you have any mouse affecting software running on your PC (Razer Synapse, CUE whatever the logitech software is called etc)

Submit a ticket to player support detailing your issue and hopefully they can help you out.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
